hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select eodp.EODR_ID, eodp.CREATOR, eodp.CREATE_TIME, eodp.MODIFIER, eodp.MODIFY_TIME, eodp.REC_VER, eodp.REC_STATUS, eodp.ORG_ID, eodp.TIME_ZONE, eodp.PM_CODE, eodp.EODR_SEQUENCE, eodp.EODR_DIVIDE_CODE, eodp.EODR_DIVIDE_NAME, eodp.EODR_WORK_TYPE_CODE, eodp.EODR_WORK_TYPE_NAME, eodp.EODR_EVENT_OBJECT_CODE, eodp.EODR_EVENT_OBJECT_NAME, eodp.EODR_PROVIDER_ROLE_CODE, eodp.EODR_PROVIDER_ROLE_NAME, eodp.EODR_AUTO_ASSIGN, eodp.EODR_REMARK, eodp.EODR_WEATHER_RECEIPT, eodp.EODR_EODP_PM_CODE, eowm.EOWM_SEQUENCE, eowm.EOWM_CODE, eowm.EOWM_NAME, eowm.EOWM_NAME_EN, eowm.EOWM_WORK_TYPE_CODE, eowm.EOWM_WORK_TYPE_NAME, eowm.EOWM_EVENT_OBJECT_CODE, eowm.EOWM_EVENT_OBJECT_NAME, eowm.EOWM_EVENT_STATUS_CODE, eowm.EOWM_EVENT_STATUS_NAME, eowm.EOWM_PLAN_TIME_SQL, eowm.EOWM_REMARK, eowm.EOWM_WORK_STATUS from eo_divide_procedure eodp,eo_work_milestone eowm where 1=1 and eodp.ORG_ID=eowm.ORG_ID and eodp.EODR_WORK_TYPE_CODE=eowm.EOWM_WORK_TYPE_CODE << and eodp.ORG_ID =:orgId>> << and eodp.EODR_EODP_PM_CODE = :eodpPmCode >> << and eodp.EODR_WORK_TYPE_CODE = :workTypeCode >> << and eodp.EODR_WORK_TYPE_CODE in(:workTypeCodes) >>
